metadata.title: CVE-2020-18378 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered inSExpressionWasmBuilder::makeBlock in wasm/wasm-s-parser.c in Binaryen1.38.26. A crafted wasm input can cause a segmentation fault, leading todenial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-as.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
